introduction.title: Transform your texts for LinkedIn
introduction.description: A simple and powerful editor to style your posts in just a few clicks.
introduction.beta: This is a beta version. If you find any bugs or have suggestions, please let us know.
introduction.preview:
🎉 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗼𝗻 𝗟𝗶𝗻𝗸𝗲𝗱𝗜𝗻 ! 🎉

Discover our revolutionary tool for formatting your texts! 🌟

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝘁𝗿𝘆 𝗶𝘁 ?

• 𝗣𝘂𝘁 𝗶𝗻 𝗮𝗱𝘃𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺: lists, 𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗶𝗰𝘀, 𝗯𝗼𝗹𝗱, etc.
• 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘇𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Adapt your posts to your image.
• 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗴𝗮𝗶𝗻: Automate formatting in one click!

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 ?

1. 𝗗𝗿𝗮𝗳𝘁 your text.
2. 𝗙𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝘁 with our tool.
3. 𝗣𝘂𝗯𝗹𝗶𝘀𝗵 on LinkedIn!

#LinkedIn #Innovation #Formatting

editor.default_text:
🎉 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗼𝗻 𝗟𝗶𝗻𝗸𝗲𝗱𝗜𝗻 ! 🎉

Discover our revolutionary tool for formatting your texts! 🌟

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝘁𝗿𝘆 𝗶𝘁 ?

• 𝗣𝘂𝘁 𝗶𝗻 𝗮𝗱𝘃𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺: lists, 𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗶𝗰𝘀, 𝗯𝗼𝗹𝗱, etc.
• 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘇𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Adapt your posts to your image.
• 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗴𝗮𝗶𝗻: Automate formatting in one click!

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 ?

1. 𝗗𝗿𝗮𝗳𝘁 your text.
2. 𝗙𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝘁 with our tool.
3. 𝗣𝘂𝗯𝗹𝗶𝘀𝗵 on LinkedIn!

#LinkedIn #Innovation #Formatting
editor.copied_description: The text has been copied to your clipboard.
editor.section_description: Use our intuitive editor to format your text with various styles, then see the live preview instantly.

preview.title: Preview your post
preview.section_description: See how your formatted text will appear in social media posts. This live preview updates as you type.

contribute.title: Contribute to Boldify
contribute.description: You can help us improve Boldify by contributing to the codebase or supporting us with a donation to keep the project free for everyone.
contribute.github_description: Contribute to the code of Boldify on GitHub. Make MR, report bugs, etc.
contribute.support_description: If you like to use Boldify and want it to remain free, consider buying me a coffee to help cover hosting costs. Every contribution counts!

footer.clarityMessage: We use Microsoft Clarity to improve our services. All data is anonymized.
footer.description: Boldify is an open source project developed by the Boldify team.
